Name: BLOCK SLIME CAVE
About the game: The block slime lives in the cave. Aim for the goal by making use of its characteristic of being able to make a big jump when you get on it. -Story Children lost in a cave of ruins. Caught in a cave-in and unable to find their way home, they continue to cry. Among them, only the bullied child, Slime Tamer, has a twinkle in his eye. 'So... this is the beginning of an adventure! He loved and admired heroic tales, but a block slime appeared before his eyes.... Will they be able to return safely to earth? -Basic motion Lift the slime. Throw the slime. Jumping on the slime will make it fly. You can also push the slime. -Rules Aim at the goal before the time limit runs out. Evaluation of up to 3 stars according to the clear time. You can advance to the next stage when the star is more than 1. -Single mode Total 50 stages Aim for the goal by using slime that makes you jump bigger, absorbs other slimes to become bigger, and warps slimes. -Cooperative 2-player mode Total of 30 stages. Let's aim at the goal in cooperation with two people. You can play online with Steam's Remote play together feature. -Game controller Left stick: move A button: Jump X button: Grab/throw slime Y button: Used in titles and menus Start button: Open/Close menu -Keyboard Left stick: move z key: Jump X key: Grab/throw slime c key: Used in titles and menus Speace button: Open/Close menu F5: Reset
